accountForm.title: Website already exists
accountForm.body:
This website has already been added to an existing account:
%(account)s
Are you sure you want to use:
%(website)s

delete.confirmText:
You are about to delete %(name)s.
You won't be able to revert this!
delete.errorText:
There was an error processing your request.
Please try again.

deactivateUser.confirmText: Are you sure you want to deactivate %(name)s

resendUserInvite.title: Resend invite
resendUserInvite.confirmText: Are you sure you want to resend the invite to %(email)s

removeUserInvite.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the invite for %(name)s

postpone.deal:
Wrong day to solve it?
Set to today or postpone it.
postpone.case:
Not the right day to act upon it?
Set to today or postpone it.

cases.noSelectionText: Please select an account or contact the case belongs to
cases.confirmButtonText: Let me fix that for you
cases.noAssigneeText: Please select a colleague or team to assign the case to

deals.title: Why lost?
deals.noSelectionText: Please select an account or contact the deal belongs to
deals.confirmButtonText: Let me fix that for you
deals.whyLostReason: Please select a reason why this deal has been lost.

email.sendCheckerText: I couldn't find a recipient, could you please fill in where I need to send this mail.
email.overwriteTemplateConfirm: Selecting a different template will reload the template. This will put your typed text at the bottom of the email. Do you want to load the template anyway?
email.reloadTemplateConfirm: Do you want to reload the template? This will load the template variables, but will put your text at the bottom of the email.

notificationPermission.title: Heads up!
notificationPermission.text: For our call integration, we need your browsers permission to send you notifications. Please allow these notifications to make complete use of our call integration.

subscription.cancelText: You are about to cancel your subscription. This will revert your account back to the free plan after the next billing date. Are you sure you want to continue?
subscription.trialStartText: Are you sure you want to start your 30 day trial of the professional plan?

disable.confirmText: You are about to disable two-factor authentication. This compromises your account security, are you sure?
disable.successText: Two factor auth was successfully disabled.

removeBackupPhoneNumber.title: Are you sure?
removeBackupPhoneNumber.html: This means you will no longer be able to login using this phone number.

error.title: Error
error.html:
There was an error processing your request.
Please try again.

endSession.title: Are you sure?
endSession.html: This means that you will be logged out from this device.

error.title: Error
error.html:
There was an error processing your request.
Please try again.

disableTwoFactorAuth.confirmText: You are about to disable two-factor authentication. This compromises your account security, are you sure?
disableTwoFactorAuth.successText: Two factor auth was successfully disabled.

general.errorText:
There was an error processing your request.
Please try again.

widgetSettings: Check/uncheck a widget to toggle the visibility of the widget.
